column1: == History ==
European occupation of the Pedra Branca range began late in the 16th century
column2: when Salvador Correia de Sá donated lands in the area to his sons in 1594. At the end of the 17th century some of the land was donated to Benedictine monks
column3: who developed farms and cattle fields.

column1: By the end of the 19th century there were extensive coffee plantations
column2: and a movement developed against the resulting deforestation that resulted in some efforts at reforestation.
